column2: §YOAS Unity§! measures how united the members states within the §YOAS§! currently are, once unity hits zero, the §YOAS§! will likely §RDissolve§!\nThe effect tooltip of this decision will show what the current unity level of the OAS is
§!The §YUnity of the OAS§! is higher than §G10§!§b

The OAS grew out of a unifaction of the Mali Federation with the Monrovia and Casablanca Groups in a attempt to build a unified West-African State. However the Mali Federation has remained in existance as a part of the organisation and stress is forming between the old Senegal-Soudan union and the rest of the OAS. Should we fully integrate the remains of Mali into the OAS, or do we keep Mali as the core of the organisation?
If Mali is preserved as an instituion, then if the OAS ever disolves we will then become the §YMali Federation§!§b
Sankara Coups the Upper Volta Government
Perhaps we could keep the name
